project_description: A Django-based freelance portfolio website showcasing services, projects, and contact information

features.feature_description: Main landing page displaying introduction and navigation
user_stories: As a visitor, I want to see an introduction to the freelancer
As a visitor, I want to navigate to different sections of the portfolio
acceptance_criteria: Navigation menu is visible and functional

features.feature_description: Display freelancing services offered with descriptions
user_stories: As a visitor, I want to see all services offered
As a visitor, I want to learn details about each service
acceptance_criteria: All services are displayed on the services page
Each service shows its description and icon

user_stories: As a visitor, I want to browse completed projects
As a visitor, I want to see details of each project
acceptance_criteria: Clicking on a project shows its details

user_stories: As a visitor, I want to learn about the freelancer
As a visitor, I want to see skills and experience
acceptance_criteria: Skills and experience are clearly presented

user_stories: As a visitor, I want to send a message to the freelancer
As a visitor, I want to know my message was received
acceptance_criteria: Success message is shown after submission
